key.name: todotxt-location
key.summary: Location of the todo.txt file

key.name: donetxt-location
key.summary: Location of the done.txt file

key.name: auto-archive
key.summary: Auto-archive done tasks to the done.txt file or not

key.name: show-done
key.summary: Show done unarchived tasks or not

key.name: add-creation-date
key.summary: Whether the creation date should be automatically added to new tasks

key.name: click-action
key.summary: What to do when a task is clicked. Valid values: 0 (edit task), 1 (mark as done or edit), 2 (nothing)

key.name: confirm-delete
key.summary: Show confirmation dialog before deleting item

key.name: keep-open-after-new
key.summary: The tasks menu will be kept open after a new task is added and the new task entry will be focused

key.name: task-insert-location
key.summary: Where to insert a new task. Valid values: 0 (at the bottom of the file), 1 (at the top of the file)

key.name: open-key
key.summary: Shortcut key to open the todo.txt extension and focus the new task entry field

key.name: debug-level
key.summary: Debug level. The lower this is, the more information will be shown. Valid values: 0 (flow), 50 (debug), 100 (detail), 150 (info), 200 (warning), 250 (error)

key.name: settings-level
key.summary: Settings level. Depending on this setting, more settings will be available. Valid values: 0 (basic), 100 (advanced), 250 (expert)

key.name: group-by
key.summary: Parameter to group the tasks by. Valid values: 0 (no grouping), 1 (group by project), 2 (group by context)

key.name: group-ungrouped
key.summary: When using grouping, should parameters without a group be put in a separate group or not?

key.name: show-number-of-group-elements
key.summary: Should the total number of elements in a group be shown or not?

key.name: show-done-or-archive-button
key.summary: Whether the 'mark as done' or 'archive' button is visible

key.name: show-delete-button
key.summary: Whether the 'delete' button is visible

key.name: show-edit-button
key.summary: Whether the 'edit' button is visible

key.name: show-priority-buttons
key.summary: Wether the 'priority up' and 'priority down' buttons are visible

key.name: show-projects-label
key.summary: Whether the projects are visible

key.name: show-contexts-label
key.summary: Whether the contexts are visible

key.name: show-new-task-entry
key.summary: Whether the 'new task' entry is visible

key.name: show-open-in-text-editor
key.summary: Whether 'open todo.txt file in text editor' is shown

key.name: url-color
key.summary: Color to display URLs in tasks. Valid values: 0 (task color), 1 (theme color), 2 (custom color)

key.name: custom-url-color
key.summary: Custom color to use for URLs if that option is selected

key.name: truncate-long-tasks
key.summary: Whether long tasks are shown truncated instead of full width

key.name: long-tasks-max-width
key.summary: Max width in pixels for tasks labels

key.name: long-tasks-expansion-mode
key.summary: Mode to expand ellipsized tasks. Valid values: 0 (scroll on label), 1 (expansion button), 2 (both)

key.name: long-tasks-ellipsize-mode
key.summary: How truncated tasks are ellipsized. Valid values: 0 (omit start characters), 1 (omit middle characters), 2 (omit end characters)

key.name: show-status-icon
key.summary: Whether to show an icon in the top bar

key.name: display-format-string
key.summary: Format string that specifies what is displayed in the top bar. Supported tokens: {unarchived} to show the number of tasks that were not yet archived and {undone} to show the number of tasks that are not yet completed.

key.name: hide-if-pattern-zero
key.summary: What to hide in the top bar if the specified pattern equals zero

key.name: hide-pattern
key.summary: Pattern that is evaluated when 'hide-if-pattern-zero' is true. If this pattern evaluates to zero, the top bar number will be hidden

key.name: style-priorities
key.summary: Whether tasks should be styled according to their priority

key.name: priority-on-done
key.summary: What to do with priorities when a task is completed. Valid options: 0 (remove priority), 1 (keep priority, prefixed with pri:), 2 (keep the priority as-is, this is not according to the todo.txt standard)

key.name: order-by-priority
key.summary: Should the elements be ordered by their priority?

key.name: only-show-priority-above
key.summary: Only show tasks with a priority of or above

key.name: priorities-markup
key.default: {'A':(true, 'rgb(237,212,0)', true, false), 'B':(true, 'rgb(115,210,22)', false, false), 'C':(true, 'rgb(0,153,204)', true, false)}
key.summary: How to display different priorities. Format: '(priority: change_color, color, bold, italic)'

key.name: enable-hidden-extension
key.summary: Whether the 'hidden' extension is enabled. If true, tasks containing 'h:1' will not be shown
